General.Name: Pathfinder Minerals PLC
General.Description: Pathfinder Minerals Plc, a natural resource company, focuses on mining heavy mineral sands in Mozambique, southern Africa. Pathfinder Minerals Plc was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 35 Berkeley Square, London, United Kingdom, W1J 5BF
